summary: Give a little more power to daedric artifacts
descriptionHtml:
Actually its a very simple mod.
It doesn\'t change gameplay or balance.

Ok, here we go.

Dawnbreaker
1.Dawnbreaker deal only fire damage (40) (cleansing flame i suppose)) 
Its seems a bit overpowered on low level, but it goes normal on 30+
2.Now the chance to unleash AOE attack is 100% (on killing undead)
3.Improved sounds (if he doing fire damage - then let him sounds like fire)

Spellbreaker
Now it has 200 ward power. So its definatly good at fights with mages and dragons.

Ebony Mail
Its very simple. I just removed this annoying \"poison\" effect.
Shadow cloak is still there. I hope stealthy chars will be happy)

Also i was hoping to improve other Artifacts, but still have no idea what to do with them)
Maybe in a future updates...

Edit:
Was added only Ebony mail improvement.
Removed \"poison\" cloud.
\"Shadow cloak\" are workinng as planned.

Edit:
Was added upgrade for Volendrung.
Now it will unleash powerful force attack on a hit.
This attack will stagger your opponents in a 25ft area.
However, i was tried to evaid OP.
So from now on, attack speed of this hammer will be greatly reduced.
author: IncuBB
